tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date DATE,
    category VARCHAR(50)
);
